summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated November 14, 2021, circulating a proposed list of names and places related to the Epstein case. The email requests additions to the list before sending a joint letter to the Court.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Appears as a recipient (Cc) of an email from an Assistant United States Attorney regarding a proposed list of names and places for a joint court letter.

events.title: Circulation of Proposed List for Court
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney circulates a proposed list of names and places to recipients, requesting additions before submitting a joint letter to the Court.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 14, 2021, from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email discusses a proposed list of names and places intended for a joint letter to be submitted to the Court.
The sender requests additions to the list from recipients, including Jeff Pagliuca, before finalizing the court submission.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal coordination and disclosure efforts in the Epstein case as of late 2021.
